mapper.update:
update user_quick_order_guestbook

mapper.select: select a.*,head_pic_code,user_mobile from user_quick_order_guestbook a LEFT JOIN user_info b on a.user_id=b.user_id where order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by create_time
